body_html:
Hi, I built the tensorflow 1.4.1 sauce code on cuda9.1, but I got the error message like this:
ImportError: libcublas.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
can anybody help?
body_text:
Hi, I built the tensorflow 1.4.1 sauce code on cuda9.1, but I got the error message like this:

can anybody help?
body:
Hi, I built the tensorflow 1.4.1 sauce code on cuda9.1, but I got the error message like this:
`ImportError: libcublas.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
`
can anybody help?
